allowNextStepsSelect.description: Determines whether next steps can be selected, true by default *
allowNextStepsSelect.description_zh: 确定是否可以选择后续步骤，默认为 true *

autoContrast.description: Determines whether icon color with filled variant should depend on background-color. If luminosity of the color prop is less than theme.luminosityThreshold, then theme.white will be used for text color, otherwise theme.black. Overrides theme.autoContrast.
autoContrast.description_zh: 确定具有 filled 变体的图标颜色是否应取决于 background-color。如果 color 属性的亮度小于 theme.luminosityThreshold，则 theme.white 将用于文本颜色，否则使用 theme.black。覆盖 theme.autoContrast。

color.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color, controls colors of active and progress steps, theme.primaryColor by default
color.description_zh: theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色，控制活动步骤和进度步骤的颜色，默认为 theme.primaryColor

completedIcon.description: Step icon displayed when step is completed, check icon by default
completedIcon.description_zh: 步骤完成时显示步骤图标，默认勾选图标

contentPadding.description: Key of theme.spacing or any valid CSS value to set padding-top of the content
contentPadding.description_zh: key，或任何有效的 CSS 值，用于设置内容的 padding-top

icon.description: Step icon, default value is step index + 1
icon.description_zh: 步骤图标，默认值为步骤索引 + 1

iconPosition.description: Icon position relative to the step body, 'left' by default
iconPosition.description_zh: 图标相对于步骤主体的位置，默认为 'left'

iconSize.description: Controls size of the step icon, by default icon size is inferred from size prop
iconSize.description_zh: 控制步骤图标的大小，默认情况下，图标大小是从 size 属性推断出来的

orientation.description_zh: 步进器方向，默认为 “水平”

progressIcon.description: Step icon displayed when step is in progress, default value is step index + 1
progressIcon.description_zh: 步骤正在进行时显示步骤图标，默认值为步骤索引 + 1

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set steps border-radius, "xl" by default
radius.description_zh: theme.radius 的键或任何用于设置步骤 border-radius、“xl”

size.description: Controls size of various Stepper elements
size.description_zh: 控制各种步进元件的大小

wrap.description: Determines whether steps should wrap to the next line if no space is available, true by default
wrap.description_zh: 确定在没有可用空间的情况下是否应将步骤换行到下一行，默认情况下为 true
